title: Enroll Patient in a Clinical Trial
description: A Clinical Research Coordinator (CRC) at a hospital site needs to enroll a patient who has consented to participate in a trial.

tasks.description: Verify that the signed informed consent form (ICF) has been obtained and is documented.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the ICF is complete and uploaded to the system.

tasks.description: Randomize the patient using the Interactive Response Technology (IRT) system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters patient details into the IRT and receives the treatment arm assignment (e.g., 'Active Drug' or 'Placebo').

tasks.description: Dispense the correct investigational product kit to the patient as directed by the IRT.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the dispensed kit number in the IRT system.

tasks.description: Update the patient's status to 'Enrolled' in the Clinical Trial Management System (CTMS).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully updates the patient's status.
